alert.note: Alert for Clay; Greene (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 13 at 3:05AM CST until January 14 at 3:26AM CST by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Memphis TN has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Arkansas...Missouri... Saint Francis River near Saint Francis ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM EARLY THIS MORNING TO LATE TONIGHT... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring. * WHERE...Saint Francis River near Saint Francis. * WHEN...From early this morning to late tonight. * IMPACTS...At 22.0 feet, Several roads near Wilhelmina, Missouri are flooded. Recreational areas and large areas of agricultural land near the river are flooded. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 2:00 AM CST Saturday the stage was 22.1 feet. - Bankfull stage is 19.0 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 2:00 AM CST Saturday was 22.1 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage later today or tonight and continue falling to 11.5 feet Wednesday evening. - Flood stage is 22.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Additional information is available at weather.gov/memphis. The next statement will be issued as additional river forecast information is received. late tonight at 330 AM CST.
